duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain clean and attractive guest rooms, hallways, and public areas in the hotel, following hotel procedures.
Service guest rooms daily, stocking cart with room supplies, replacing bed linens, and replenishing guest room supplies as per company standards and safety/security procedures.
Conduct 'deep cleaning' activities within guest rooms along with preventative maintenance tasks when required.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent, experience in hotel or related field preferred.
